title: Kubernetes Cluster Automation Platform
summary: Enterprise-grade Kubernetes cluster automation with Terraform and Helm. Includes auto-scaling, monitoring, and GitLab CI/CD integration for seamless container orchestration.

title: AWS Multi-Region Infrastructure Framework
summary: Highly available AWS infrastructure deployed across multiple regions using Terraform. Features automated disaster recovery, monitoring, and compliance checks.

title: DevSecOps Pipeline Framework
summary: Comprehensive DevSecOps pipeline integrating security scanning, compliance checks, and vulnerability management throughout the CI/CD process.

title: Prometheus & Grafana Monitoring Stack
summary: Production-grade monitoring stack with Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager. Includes custom dashboards and alerting for cloud infrastructure.

title: Terraform AWS Module Collection
summary: Reusable Terraform modules for AWS infrastructure deployment. Covers networking, computing, storage, and security components.
